backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping login-page-related features to corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing key frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base plus warm neutral palette variables and Bootstrap override styles for the login page.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads Bootstrap via CDN and mounts the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LoginPage component as the root view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and logic using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus warm neutral palette definitions and custom login-page visual overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Bootstrap-styled login form with email/password inputs, warm theme, and simulated submit handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements for a Bootstrap-based login page and listing existing features and pending requests.
